articles.title: Wanted to help cops, victims: Indian-origin man who pinned Bondi Beach shooter down - Tribune India
articles.description: A 34-year-old Indian-origin man who helped restrain one of the alleged shooters of the Bondi Beach attack in Australia said he wanted to help bring one of the assailants down and assist anyone who needed help.
